# {reactablefmtr}

## Streamlined Table Styling and Formatting for {reactable}

#### Speaker: **Kyle Cuilla**
* This talk will provide examples on how to use the {reactablefmtr} package to streamline and enhance the look of interactive tables built with {reactable}. Kyle will also be discussing the motivation behind creating {reactablefmtr}.

Kyle Cuilla is a Lead Data Scientist within the financial services industry. He holds a Master's Degree in Data Analytics from Penn State University. Kyle is the creator of the {reactablefmtr} package and received Honorable Mentions for his entries in the 2020 and 2021 RStudio Table Contests.
